title: Iranian Strikes on Gulf States Reach the Hundreds
summary_full: Iran has fired nearly 400 missiles and over 800 drones across the Persian Gulf in the past two days, according to government reports.
summary_public: Iran has fired nearly 400 missiles and over 800 drones across the Persian Gulf in the past two days, according to government reports.

IR.label: negative
